backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend for a news platform with CRUD operations for news articles, reviews, and user profiles, including role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two actor-readiness features (ActorLoadingGuard and useQueries null-guard) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the AP Insight News app that mounts the React root div, loads the main TSX module, and includes a Google AdSense script tag.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router configuration with all app routes (home, political, movies, article detail, admin, admin reviews) wrapped in a RootLayout that uses ActorLoadingGuard to block rendering until the backend actor is ready.
frontend/src/components/ActorLoadingGuar: React component that gates child rendering on backend actor availability, showing a spinner while fetching and an error/retry screen if the actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/AdBanner.tsx: Reusable Google AdSense banner component supporting horizontal (728×90) and rectangle (300×250) formats, with a one-time push to adsbygoogle and silent error handling.
frontend/src/components/ArticleCard.tsx: Article card component with four display variants (featured, newspaper, default, compact) for rendering news articles with images, category badges, and metadata.
Renders a single news article as a compact list item with thumbnail, category badge, title, summary, author, and date, linking to the article detail page.
frontend/src/components/BreakingNewsTick: Displays a horizontally scrolling breaking news ticker bar showing the latest 10 article titles as links, with a fallback default text when no articles are loaded.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand logo, description, quick navigation links, category links, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the sticky site header including the breaking news ticker, logo, current date, desktop/mobile navigation links, and admin action buttons.
frontend/src/components/TopStoriesSideba: Renders a sidebar showing the top 5 articles as a numbered list with titles and dates, followed by an ad banner below.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing admin access control if a token is present, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and exposing login status states to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including fetching, adding, and deleting news articles and reviews, as well as purging expired articles.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes along with news-specific utility component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page for managing news articles, providing a form to add new articles and a list view with delete and purge-expired actions, restricted to authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewsPage.tsx: Admin page that lists all user reviews across articles with the ability to delete individual reviews via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Full article detail page displaying article content, expiry status, related articles, and a reviews section where authenticated users can submit star ratings and text reviews.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page that displays a hero article, secondary stories, and category sections (political, movie news) with skeleton loading states and ad banners.
frontend/src/pages/MovieNewsPage.tsx: Paginated movie news listing page with a sidebar of top stories, skeleton loaders, and a 'Load More' button for incremental article display.
frontend/src/pages/PoliticalNewsPage.tsx: Paginated political news listing page mirroring MovieNewsPage structure, fetching articles by the political category with sidebar and load-more support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, news-specific color tokens, condensed/Telugu font families, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features and known issues, specifically focused on fixing the 'Backend connection not ready' initialization error in the actor/query hooks.
